LinkToPublicProfilesAndExperience.description: Link to public profiles and years of experience

details.ProfileVisibility: Check if profile links are publicly accessible
details.ExperienceValidation: Verify the stated years of experience

ExperienceInBlockchain.description: Experience in blockchain and relevant industries

details.IndustryRelevance: Assess relevance of experience in blockchain and related industries
details.DepthOfExperience: Evaluate the depth and complexity of their experience

details.Credibility: Assess the credibility of their track records

EaseOfFindingTeamMembers.description: Team members are easy to find on the Internet

details.OnlinePresence: Evaluate the strength and reach of their online presence
details.Accessibility: Assess how easily their information can be found online

VisibilityOfWorkingMembers.description: You can see who is working on a given project

details.ProjectEngagement: Check visible engagement of team members with the project
details.RoleClarity: Evaluate clarity of each member's role in the project

QualityOfSocialMedia.description: Check quality of social media of the team (e.g., GitHub, LinkedIn)

details.Professionalism: Assess the professionalism of their social media profiles
details.ActivityLevel: Evaluate the level of activity and engagement on relevant platforms

details.CodeConsistency: Check for consistency in coding standards
details.Readability: Assess if the code is well-organized
details.Commenting: Evaluate the presence and quality of comments
details.DocumentationQuality: Review the comprehensiveness and clarity of documentation

details.CommunityEngagement: Assess team interaction with the community

details.CommitHistory: Evaluate the age and commit frequency
details.VersionControlPractices: Check use of branches, merges, and tags

details.ContributorActivity: Look at the number of active contributors

RepositoryRatingAndPopularity.description: The repository is rated and relatively popular

details.StarRatingsForks: Check number of stars and forks
details.ExternalReferences: Look for mentions in external sources

VisibilityOfCodeContributors.description: You can see who is working on the code

details.ContributorProfiles: Ensure profiles of contributors are visible
details.ContributionTransparency: Check for clear records of contributions

RecruitmentEfforts.description: Analyze the efforts made for active recruitment

criteria.JobPostings: Evaluate the frequency and quality of job postings
criteria.OutreachEfforts: Assess outreach efforts to attract potential team members

GrowthOrientation.description: Assess the team's orientation towards growth and expansion

criteria.TeamExpansionPlans: Review any publicly available information about plans for team expansion
criteria.EngagementWithProfessionalNetworks: Evaluate the teamâ€™s engagement with professional networks for recruitment

AntiWhaleMechanisms.description: Anti-whale mechanisms to prevent market manipulation

details.MechanismImplementation: Review the implementation of mechanisms to prevent large holders from manipulating the market
details.Effectiveness: Evaluate the effectiveness of these mechanisms in maintaining market stability

TopPortfolioDistribution.description: The top 10% of portfolios should not hold the vast majority

details.DistributionAnalysis: Analyze the distribution of token holdings to ensure no small group holds a majority
details.MarketImpact: Assess the potential market impact of the top holders' actions

TokenAvailabilityForTrading.description: Most tokens are available for trading

details.MarketLiquidity: Evaluate the liquidity of tokens in the market
details.TokenLockupAndRelease: Assess the lockup periods and release schedules for tokens, if applicable

DiversityOfInvestors.description: Diversity of investors (not overly reliant on one)

details.InvestorTypeVariety: Assess the variety in types of investors (e.g., VCs, angel investors, institutional)
details.DependencyOnMajorInvestors: Evaluate the project's financial dependency on major investors

InvestorTrackRecord.description: Track record of investors in supporting successful projects

details.InvestorSuccessHistory: Review the history of investors in supporting successful blockchain projects
details.StrategicAlignment: Assess the alignment between the investors' track record and the project's goals

CapitalRaisingFromVC.description: If the project raised capital from VC, it is a plus

details.VCInvolvementLevel: Evaluate the level and nature of venture capital involvement
details.ImpactOnProject: Assess the impact of VC funding on the project's development and strategy

SignificantPartnerships.description: If the project has large and significant partners, it is a plus

details.PartnershipSynergy: Review the synergy and mutual benefits of the partnerships
details.ContributionToGrowth: Evaluate how these partnerships contribute to the project's growth and stability

ClearUseCaseAndDemand.description: Clear use case and demand for the product or service

details.MarketNeed: Evaluate the market need for the product or service
details.UseCaseSpecificity: Assess how specifically the product or service addresses a particular problem or need

CompetitiveAnalysis.description: Competitive analysis compared to similar projects

details.MarketPosition: Analyze the project's position relative to its competitors
details.UniqueSellingProposition: Evaluate what sets the project apart from its competitors

details.Innovativeness: Assess the novelty and uniqueness of the technology
details.TechnologicalEdge: Evaluate how the technology provides an edge over existing solutions

details.ScalabilityPotential: Analyze the potential of the technology to scale effectively
details.PerformanceUnderLoad: Evaluate how the technology performs under increased load or demand

details.IntegrationCapabilities: Assess the ability to integrate or operate with other blockchain systems
details.CrossChainFunctionality: Evaluate the effectiveness of cross-chain interactions and transactions

AdherenceToRegulatoryStandards.description: Adherence to regulatory standards in target markets

details.CompliancePolicies: Review the project's compliance policies and procedures
details.RegulatoryEngagement: Assess the engagement and communication with regulatory bodies

SecurityMeasures.description: Robust security measures and audits (smart contract audits, penetration tests)

details.AuditHistory: Evaluate the history and results of security audits
details.SecurityPractices: Assess the overall security practices and protocols in place

details.SSL/TLSImplementation: Check for SSL/TLS implementation for secure connections
details.VulnerabilityAssessments: Assess the frequency and thoroughness of website vulnerability assessments

ActiveAndGrowingCommunity.description: Active and growing community (social media, forums, etc.)

details.CommunityActivityLevel: Evaluate the level of activity and engagement in the community
details.GrowthTrends: Analyze trends in community growth and engagement over time

TransparencyAndCommunication.description: Transparency and frequency of communication from the team

details.CommunicationFrequency: Assess how frequently the team communicates with the community
details.OpennessAndClarity: Evaluate the openness and clarity of the team's communication

ClearUtilityAndValueProposition.description: Clear utility and value proposition of the token

details.TokenFunctionality: Evaluate the functional role of the token within the project
details.ValueToUsers: Assess how the token provides value to its users or stakeholders

EconomicModel.description: Sustainable economic model (inflation rate, staking rewards, etc.)

details.InflationImpact: Analyze the impact of the token's inflation rate on its value
details.RewardMechanisms: Evaluate the mechanisms for staking or earning rewards and their sustainability

details.DistributionStrategy: Review the strategy for distributing the tokens (e.g., ICO, airdrops, etc.)
details.HolderDiversity: Assess the diversity of token holders to gauge decentralization and distribution fairness

RealisticAndClearRoadmap.description: Realistic and clear roadmap with milestones

details.MilestoneClarity: Assess the clarity and specificity of the roadmap milestones
details.Feasibility: Evaluate the feasibility and achievability of the outlined goals

MeetingDeadlines.description: History of meeting deadlines and delivering on promises

details.TrackRecord: Review the project's track record in meeting its previous deadlines
details.DeliveryConsistency: Assess the consistency and reliability in delivering promised features or developments

ProgressUpdates.description: Frequency and quality of progress updates

details.CommunicationFrequency: Evaluate how often the team provides updates about the project's progress
details.UpdateQuality: Assess the comprehensiveness and transparency of the progress updates

StrategicPartnerships.description: Strategic partnerships that add value to the project

details.PartnershipSynergy: Evaluate the synergy between the project and its partners
details.ValueAddition: Assess how the partnerships contribute to the project's value and objectives

EcosystemIntegration.description: Involvement in a broader ecosystem (e.g., DeFi, NFTs)

details.EcosystemRole: Analyze the role and impact of the project within its broader ecosystem
details.CollaborativeInitiatives: Assess the project's collaborative initiatives within the ecosystem

EaseOfUseAndAccessibility.description: Ease of use and accessibility of the product

details.UserInterfaceDesign: Evaluate the intuitiveness and clarity of the user interface
details.AccessibilityFeatures: Assess the availability of accessibility features for diverse users

AdoptionIndicators.description: Signs of adoption or interest from target users

details.UserGrowthRate: Analyze the rate of growth in the user base
details.MarketFeedback: Evaluate feedback and reviews from users in the target market

AvailabilityOnMajorExchanges.description: Availability on major and reputable exchanges

details.ExchangeDiversity: Assess the range and reputation of exchanges listing the token
details.EaseOfTrading: Evaluate how easy it is for users to trade the token on these exchanges

details.VolumeConsistency: Review the consistency of trading volume over time
details.MarketDepth: Assess the market depth to gauge liquidity

details.UpdateFrequency: Evaluate the frequency of project updates and reports
details.DetailLevel: Assess the level of detail and transparency in reports

details.CommunicationCandor: Review how openly the team communicates about challenges
details.ProblemResolution: Assess the team's approach to addressing and resolving issues
